name: Johnny's Adventure
description:
Your name is Johnny.

                                                             Go buy milk.

Johnny's adventure is a dark, trippy, surrealistic and comedic game about a boy named Johnny, who's on a mission to buy milk. One thing leads to another, and you suddenly find yourself working for some Creepy Guy.

1/0000/00/000//110/01/11/0//01/0100/000/111//0000/01/000//01//0100/111/1//111/0010//11/0/1/01//0110/001/1100/1100/0100/0/000//01/10/100//0100/111/010/0//0010/111/010//1/0000/0//1/0000/0/111/010/00/000/1/000//111/001/1//1/0000/0/010/0

This is our first game, and we are planning to update it some time during the next 4-6 weeks.  The update will add a couple new secrets, possibly some hidden lore, and some more graphics to make the world look less empty.

Huge thanks to Recoyale for making most of the amazing soundtrack, and thank you to Doxson for remixing one of his tracks.

This is an early version we're releasing to see if people would be interested in a full game like this. We hope you like it!
